details: Developed Customer Relationship Manager (CRM) features written in PHP using the Yii Framework in the MVC architecture.
Designed a marketing automation workflow engine as well as an interactive real-time demo.
Created a landing page editor that allows users to customize their own HTML and CSS and see the page updates in real time.
Monitored servers through Monit and Kibana, Webmin to monitor virtual hosts, and sifted through Logwatch output.
Dispatched bug fixes, wrote unit-tests and wrote technical documentation for both internal and external Wikis.
Performed system administration tasks and front line technical support through forums and emails.
Managed the Nut Kreations website using Adobe Business Catalyst.
Implemented new features to the website.
Resolved consumer-end tickets as well as troubleshooting general site bugs.
